transcript: Can you find the minifigure? >> There are 200,000 Lego bricks in each of their piles. >> What? What is your strategy to find a Lego? >> You know, first I used my body. That didn't work. And then I was going to go brick by brick. Is this it? Is that it? >> We're going to be here all day. >> Okay. I was trying to use the typical video game strategy and dig straight down, but I can't even reach the bottom of it. >> Thanks so much to the LEGO Group for sponsoring this video. >> The team. Okay, >> somebody's got to find him. >> Who's going to find the mini figure first? >> I'm getting so tired. >> For all we know, Iron Man could be over here. >> Iron Man could be over here. >> I found it. Josh is the winner. Watch the Lego Marvel Brick Burst challenges on lego.com/brickfirst.
